transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDate as string,
		Region as string,
		Rep as string,
		Item as string,
		Units as string,
		{Unit Cost} as string,
		Total as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExcelCSV
ExcelCSV pivot(groupBy(Region),
	pivotBy(Item),
	{Sales Total} = sum(toDouble(Total)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 derive({Sales TotalBinder} = toDouble(byName('Sales TotalBinder')),
		{Sales TotalDesk} = toDouble(byName('Sales TotalDesk')),
		{Sales TotalPen} = toDouble(byName('Sales TotalPen')),
		{Sales TotalPen Set} = toDouble(byName('Sales TotalPen Set')),
		{Sales TotalPencil} = toDouble(byName('Sales TotalPencil'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['PivotOutput.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkds
